name: Fashion Makeover Dress Up Game
description:
Everything is glamorous in - Fashion Makeover: Dress Up Game Your way to become the real fashion designer!

Do you have an eye for all the latest fashion trends & NEW styles?

Have the fashion sense of a real fashionista?

Want to get on top of the fashion design world?

Then this trendy fashion game is for you!

Test your fashion design skills on your way to becoming a real fashion stylist! Dress up your model for the runway or a show & shock the fashion world with your exclusive fashion sense!

Are you really fashion-forward as you think? Match the elegant fashion clothing with majestic hair styles to continue your climb to the top of the fashion world!

Create stunning looks for your models to gain coins & diamonds! You can use them to haul fabulous clothes & accessories for your customers. Don't forget to maximize them at the end of every level!

Dress up your model for the runway and get rewards! You can be the glamourous fashion design STAR of every runway and show in town with the right hairstyle of course!

Pick a stellar outfit for your model & make her stand out from everyone else, vibrant or neutral colors? slick & sharp or dressy & kicky? You will need to make the right choice for every occasion! Experts tip: Don’t forget the importance of the right hairstyle to match with your model look*

You will need a real sophisticated fashion sense and create the unique looks with tasteful hair styles & fashion accessories and get your customers to win runways & shows.

Fashion Makeover: Dress up Game is there with you from your start in the beautiful world of fashion design, you can click on the hint icon on the screen while styling your customer to better understand your client fashion designers.

Game Features:
- Vast Variety of Clothes, Shoes and Fashion Accessories
- Gift Box: Earn Gifts for completing a level, the gift box
will provide you coins which you can use to buy fashion accessories.
- Match and create fashion clothes & accessories to create your unique fashion set
- Now available in 25 languages - English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish, Filipino, Finnish, Japanese, Malay, Polish, Romanian, Swedish, Vietnamese, Arabic, Dutch, Indonesian, Italian, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, French, German, Norwegian and Kazakh.
